Python toolkit for emulation and decision making under uncertainty
Accessible and built with reusable components
Independent of the modelling framework. Use it with MXNet, TensorFlow, etc
Open Source under the Apache-2.0 license

Emukit-playground

Jun 13, 2016
The Emukit-playground is a demo that was developed by Adam Hirst to illustrate different concepts in emulation an uncertainty quantification.

Bayesian Optimization

Jun 12, 2016
Bayesian optimization is a sequential decision making approach to find the optimum of expensive to evaluate objective functions.

Multi-fidelity emulation

Jun 10, 2016
Below elements can be used just by adding certain classes to regular html elements. Since the theme is based on Bootstrap, you can use any bootstrap class in this theme.

Experimental design

Jun 9, 2016

Bayesian Quadrature

Jun 9, 2016
Bayesian quadrature [1, 2] is an active learning method for the value of an integral given queries of the integrand on a finite and usually small amount of input locations.
